video.title: Weeds
video.synopsis: A suburban mother starts selling marijuana to her affluent neighbors so she can maintain her comfortable lifestyle after her husband's sudden death.

episodes.synopsis: Following her husband's untimely death, suburban mom Nancy Botwin goes into business for herself selling marijuana to her friends and neighbors.
episodes.title: You Can't Miss the Bear

episodes.synopsis: As Nancy struggles to make ends meet at home, Doug Wilson suggests starting a legitimate business as a money-laundering front for her marijuana sales.
episodes.title: Free Goat

episodes.synopsis: Agrestic residents are terrorized by a mountain lion, but Nancy contends with something even fiercer: competition from a medical marijuana facility.
episodes.title: Good Sh*t Lollipop

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected visit from Nancy's brother-in-law threatens to turn her life upside down, and she and Doug must choose a location for their fake bakery.
episodes.title: Fashion of the Christ

episodes.synopsis: Nancy is spooked after glimpsing the darker side of the business. Andy runs into trouble with the law, and Silas breaks up with Megan.
episodes.title: Lude Awakening

episodes.synopsis: Andy attends court-ordered "Marijuana Anonymous" meetings and finds an undeniably sexy sponsor. Nancy's housekeeper, Lupita, grows suspicious.
episodes.title: Dead in the Nethers

episodes.synopsis: Nancy takes on a local college student as her first full-time employee. Celia's breast cancer surgery invites a new outlook on life -- and her mother.
episodes.title: Higher Education

episodes.synopsis: Things get complicated when Nancy spurns the advances of charming Peter Scottson but takes a walk on the wild side with a rival drug dealer.
episodes.title: The Punishment Light

episodes.synopsis: Nancy gets caught dealing dope on a college campus, but an anonymous angel comes to her aid. Celia reclaims her rightful place at the head of the PTA.
episodes.title: The Punishment Lighter

episodes.synopsis: Heylia threatens to cut Nancy off, so she and Conrad decide to go into the growing business for themselves. Silas plans to blackmail his mother.
episodes.title: The Godmother

episodes.synopsis: Nancy tries to break it off with Peter when she realizes that dating a DEA agent isn't a good idea. Celia decides to run for Doug's city council seat.
episodes.title: Corn Snake

episodes.synopsis: Nancy, Andy and Doug go full speed ahead in setting up their grow house, even as Andy continues his efforts to enroll in rabbinical school.
episodes.title: Cooking with Jesus

episodes.synopsis: While Nancy puzzles over what to do about Peter, Shane's budding puberty is affecting the plumbing. Meanwhile, Celia enrolls Isabelle in boot camp.
episodes.title: Last Tango in Agrestic

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Conrad continue to grow their business; Celia forges ahead in her campaign for Doug's seat; and Isabelle gets offered a modeling contract.
episodes.title: A.K.A. the Plant

episodes.synopsis: Nancy starts to worry what the neighbors might think, particularly the Armenian mobsters who are moving in on her grow house.
episodes.title: Mrs. Botwin's Neighborhood

episodes.synopsis: A suspicious raid on the grow house sows seeds of mistrust between Conrad and Nancy. Celia makes life hard for Isabelle on the Huskeroos ad shoot.
episodes.title: Crush Girl Love Panic

episodes.synopsis: On Election Day, Dean accidentally aids his wife to victory, but the vote tally isn't the only surprising result for Doug and Celia.
episodes.title: Must Find Toes

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Conrad sell their brand-new product to celebrity pot aficionado Snoop Dogg. Heylia is angry to learn that Conrad is in cahoots with Nancy.
episodes.title: MILF Money

episodes.synopsis: Peter tries to convince Nancy to take an early retirement from the marijuana business. Silas and Shane pay homage to their dad on his birthday.
episodes.title: Bash

episodes.synopsis: After a close call with the DEA, Heylia brings the hammer down on Nancy. Andy's spunky, flaky, long-lost gal pal shows up at the Botwin residence.
episodes.title: Mile Deep and a Foot Wide

episodes.synopsis: After overhearing Nancy and Conrad trash-talking him, Peter wants everything they've got -- and there doesn't seem to be a thing they can do about it.
episodes.title: Yeah, Just Like Tomatoes

episodes.synopsis: Chaos rules as Silas goes missing, Shane goes off at his graduation, and Celia goes nuts. At the grow house, the craziness is closing in on Nancy.
episodes.title: Pittsburgh

episodes.synopsis: After being threatened by U-Turn, Nancy searches for Silas and her hijacked pot. Celia has Silas arrested for stealing her "Drug Free Zone" signs.
episodes.title: Doing the Backstroke

episodes.synopsis: After retrieving the pot floating in her pool, Nancy tries to return it to working condition. Andy's Amber Alert helps the police locate Shane.
episodes.title: A Pool and His Money

episodes.synopsis: Nancy gathers Silas, Shane, Andy and Lupita to brainstorm ways to come up with the money to pay off her debt to U-Turn.
episodes.title: The Brick Dance

episodes.synopsis: Nancy explores alternate sources of income, including obtaining a real job; Conrad and Heylia set up their new grow house.
episodes.title: Sh*t Highway

episodes.synopsis: Nancy's world gets further entangled with U-Turn's gangster life, both Celia and Doug make deals with Sullivan Groff, and Shane starts summer school.
episodes.title: Bill Sussman

episodes.synopsis: Nancy throws a cocktail party for town leaders amid U-Turn's increasing presence; U-Turn pays Conrad and Heylia a threatening visit.
episodes.title: Grasshopper

episodes.synopsis: Nancy makes a deal for her future after U-Turn's death. Doug has everyone against Sullivan except for Celia, who's more interested in him than ever.
episodes.title: He Taught Me How to Drive-By

episodes.synopsis: As she tries to rekindle her own business, Nancy encounters Peter's other ex-wife, Valerie; while suspended from school, Shane and Isabelle bond.
episodes.title: The Two Mrs. Scottsons

episodes.synopsis: Nancy forges an unlikely friendship with Peter's ex-wife, while Celia's budding romance with Sullivan gets sidetracked when Dean is hospitalized.
episodes.title: Release the Hounds

episodes.synopsis: Nancy expands her distribution network, money is rolling in, and everything looks great...until her new friend betrays her and the DEA comes calling.
episodes.title: Roy Till Called

episodes.synopsis: Valerie's private investigator tracks Nancy; Doug (and the rest of Agrestic's city council) are out of jobs; and Shane installs a security system.
episodes.title: Cankles

episodes.synopsis: Celia wants in on the drug business; a fire inspector panics Heylia and Conrad; Andy and Dean play murder ball; Doug steals the cross off a church.
episodes.title: The Dark Time

episodes.synopsis: Nancy explores her new relationship with Conrad while doing business with the biker gang.
episodes.title: Risk

episodes.synopsis: Nancy deals with an injured Silas and a mentally unstable Shane while deciding how to handle the increasing biker gang threat.
episodes.title: Protection

episodes.synopsis: As the wildfire approaches, everyone must evacuate. Nancy tells her family to pack up, while Conrad and Heylia must say goodbye to the grow house.
episodes.title: Go

episodes.synopsis: With the embers of Majestic and Agrestic smoldering in their rearview mirror, Nancy and family flee southbound to the border town of Ren Mar, Calif.
episodes.title: Mother Thinks the Birds Are After Her

episodes.synopsis: After settling her family in Ren Mar, Nancy gets back to business. Guillermo gives her a much-needed crash course in "running" across the border.
episodes.title: Lady's a Charm

episodes.synopsis: Nancy makes her first successful smuggling run across the border. Meanwhile, Capt. Till strikes a deal with Celia to get her out of jail.
episodes.title: The Whole Blah Damn Thing

episodes.synopsis: After Bubbie's death, Nancy is sent on a mission and takes Andy along with her, and Lenny decides to sell the house.
episodes.title: The Three Coolers

episodes.synopsis: Guillermo gives Nancy a new job, and she finds that retail isn't as mundane as it appears. Celia's deal brings her dangerously close to the action.
episodes.title: No Man Is Pudding

episodes.synopsis: Nancy follows the tunnel in the back of the maternity shop and gets an eyeful. Dean takes a new job, leaving Isabelle to live with Celia.
episodes.title: Excellent Treasures

episodes.synopsis: Denied a share of the incoming pot, Nancy confronts Esteban; Celia discovers the benefits of Mexican pharmacies; and Shane finds some shocking photos.
episodes.title: Yes I Can

episodes.synopsis: Esteban and Nancy's spontaneous date ends in near violence, and Andy and Doug successfully smuggle their first customer across the border.
episodes.title: I Am the Table

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Esteban struggle to find time for each other. Nancy has a talk with her sons about Shane's new fantasies and Silas's new girlfriend.
episodes.title: Little Boats

episodes.synopsis: Nancy discovers the truth about the tunnel; Esteban cures Nancy's nagging headache with a powerful remedy; Celia's family stages an intervention.
episodes.title: The Love Circle Overlap

episodes.synopsis: Nancy deals with Shane's exploits, Guillermo, and her ayahuasca trip. Celia's struggles with her rehab partner force her to a new facility.
episodes.title: Head Cheese

episodes.synopsis: Nancy informs the DEA about the drug tunnel while she plays it cool with Esteban. Celia sets out to make amends with her family.
episodes.title: Till We Meet Again

episodes.synopsis: The DEA interrogates Nancy, who must then explain things to Esteban, and Celia travels deep into Mexico to make amends with her estranged daughter.
episodes.title: If You Work for a Living, Why Do You Kill Yourself Working?

episodes.synopsis: Nancy returns to her family in Ren Mar, but is still unsure of her fate. Meanwhile, Celia is held hostage in Mexico by her estranged daughter, Quinn.
episodes.title: Wonderful Wonderful

episodes.synopsis: Nancy gets an ominous message from Guillermo and must visit him in prison. Silas and Doug discover that growing pot on federal land is tough.
episodes.title: Machetes Up Top

episodes.synopsis: Nancy gets a surprise visit from her estranged sister. But when the bodyguard Esteban assigned to her goes missing, Nancy flees with her family.
episodes.title: Su-Su-Sucio

episodes.synopsis: Nancy must decide the fate of a rogue DEA agent. Celia sets up camp in Nancy's garage, and Andy discovers Judah's old bank account.
episodes.title: Super Lucky Happy

episodes.synopsis: Nancy visits her obstetrician to discuss the possibility of aborting the baby. Meanwhile, Shane goes to get his pot back from Mr. Sandusky.
episodes.title: Van Nuys

episodes.synopsis: With Nancy in full bloom, Esteban proposes, and all seems right with the world -- until Nancy discovers there's another woman in Esteban's life.
episodes.title: A Modest Proposal

episodes.synopsis: Nancy learns the identity of the other woman in Esteban's life and, with Andy and Audra's help, takes matters into her own hands.
episodes.title: Where the Sidewalk Ends

episodes.synopsis: Tensions rise between Nancy and Esteban as Pilar adds to the conflict. Meanwhile, Dean helps Silas and Doug get their dispensary back on track.
episodes.title: A Distinctive Horn

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Andy struggle with the realities of parenting. Meanwhile, Celia and Dean take advantage of a surplus in product and a new marketing scheme.
episodes.title: Suck 'n' Spit

episodes.synopsis: Nancy tries to protect Shane and Silas from new enemies. Meanwhile, Esteban deals with a campaign problem, and Andy reconnects with Audra.
episodes.title: Perro Insano

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Esteban deal with the arrival of Esteban's daughter, Adelita. Andy and Audra spend a day in bed, and Celia explores her sexuality.
episodes.title: Ducks and Tigers

episodes.synopsis: Andy joins Nancy and Cesar on their search for Esteban, while Silas and Shane find themselves becoming protective of their new stepsister, Adelita.
episodes.title: Glue

episodes.synopsis: Nancy learns of Esteban's fate and takes action to preserve her own. Meanwhile, Silas helps Adelita with a disturbing medical issue.
episodes.title: All About My Mom

episodes.synopsis: After Pilar's death, Nancy and her family have to run, but Andy has doubts about leaving.
episodes.title: Thwack

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and her family have to find a destination for their run, while Esteban has to answer some questions from the authorities.
episodes.title: Felling and Swamping

episodes.synopsis: Nancy becomes a scab laborer in a Seattle hotel. Shane looks after Stevie, and Doug goes back to Ren Mar.
episodes.title: A Yippity Sippity

episodes.synopsis: Nancy makes a deal with the concierge, and Shane becomes part of a mommy group. Meanwhile, Doug is questioned by Cesar and Ignacio.
episodes.title: Bliss

episodes.synopsis: The Botwins' flight continues after a parking violation and Doug gets into a hostage situation.
episodes.title: Boomerang

episodes.synopsis: Nancy brings her son back while Andy and Silas wait in a diner.
episodes.title: A Shoe for a Shoe

episodes.synopsis: In Montana, Nancy, her sons and Doug visit a fair, while Andy takes part in a butter-eating contest.
episodes.title: Pinwheels and Whirligigs

episodes.synopsis: After reaching Pioneer Town in their RV, Nancy looks for customers while the family sets a mobile hash-making shop inside the RV.
episodes.title: Gentle Puppies

episodes.synopsis: When the color of baby Stevie's poo alarms Nancy, she and Andy take a risk and consult a doctor. Meanwhile, Silas and Shane sell hash at a concert.
episodes.title: To Moscow, and Quickly

episodes.synopsis: Nancy goes back to her hometown, where she hopes to make enough money to emigrate. Meanwhile, Andy and Doug are assigned to procure fake passports.
episodes.title: Dearborn-Again

episodes.synopsis: Nancy is confronted with more guests from her past during her stop in Dearborn.
episodes.title: Viking Pride

episodes.synopsis: Nancy talks to Vaughn while Andy, Shane and Warren try to acquire more money to pay for the passports and Doug looks for his own passport in Agrestic.
episodes.title: Fran Tarkenton

episodes.synopsis: While Andy, Shane and Warren wait at the airport, Nancy finally faces Esteban. Meanwhile, Silas has to choose between Lars and his family.
episodes.title: Theoretical Love is Not Dead

episodes.synopsis: After doing three years' hard time, Nancy is abruptly released from federal prison and transferred to a halfway house in New York City.
episodes.title: Bags

episodes.synopsis: Nancy tries to get her life back on track in big, bad New York City. But when Andy and Shane show up unexpectedly, she is thrown for a loop.
episodes.title: From Trauma Cometh Something

episodes.synopsis: Nancy, struggling to fit in at the halfway house, has an unexpected bomb dropped on her by Jill. Meanwhile, Andy and Shane lock down a place to live.
episodes.title: Game-Played

episodes.synopsis: Nancy pursues a job at the office where Doug works, while Andy finds himself in a romantic situation that just might be over his head.
episodes.title: A Hole in Her Niqab

episodes.synopsis: Nancy returns to California to continue her custody battle against Jill. Meanwhile, Andy's polyamorous relationship takes a bizarre turn.
episodes.title: Fingers-Only Meat Banquet

episodes.synopsis: Nancy confronts an old friend, leaving Silas caught in the crossfire. Back at the loft, Andy comes up with a new business venture.
episodes.title: Object Impermanence

episodes.synopsis: Nancy sells pot at the hedge fund company softball game while Doug plays on the field. Meanwhile, Andy has the grand opening of his new bike shop.
episodes.title: Vehement vs. Vigorous

episodes.synopsis: When Nancy's old cell mate visits, things get complicated with her supplier. Meanwhile, Andy and Silas battle over the use of Andy's bike shop.
episodes.title: Synthetics

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Andy try to fight off Zoya as she attempts to take over the bike shop. Meanwhile, local rival dealers approach Silas.
episodes.title: Cats! Cats! Cats!

episodes.synopsis: Nancy, Andy and Silas attempt to strike back at Emma after she deals them a bad business blow. Meanwhile, Doug has trouble with his hedge fund.
episodes.title: System Overhead

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to expand her business, Nancy follows Doug and Andy to East Hampton for the weekend. Meanwhile, Silas tries to win Emma back.
episodes.title: Une Mère Que J'aimerais Baiser

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Silas face off over control of their drug business, while Andy tries to mediate. Meanwhile, Shane tries to win back Det. Ouellette's trust.
episodes.title: Qualitative Spatial Reasoning

episodes.synopsis: Silas betrays Nancy, while Shane makes one last attempt to protect her from Ouellette. Back on Wall Street, Doug and Whit come up with a plan.
episodes.title: Do Her/Don't Do Her

episodes.synopsis: While Nancy languishes in a chemically induced coma after being shot in the head, the family is left to guess the shooter's identity.
episodes.title: Messy

episodes.synopsis: While Nancy recovers from her gunshot wound, Andy and Jill get a surprise visit from Jill's husband, and Silas maintains an unconventional affair.
episodes.title: A Beam of Sunshine

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Silas chase after Shane, who's uncovered Nancy's shooter. Doug and Whit come up with a new plan after losing their jobs at the hedge fund.
episodes.title: See Blue and Smell Cheese and Die

episodes.synopsis: Nancy plans a family dinner while tending to her pot business, and Andy and Jill agree to watch Stevie. Meanwhile, Silas befriends a local pot grower.
episodes.title: Only Judy Can Judge

episodes.synopsis: Nancy's attempts to raise money for Stevie's soccer fees tempt her back to her old ways. Jill uses Doug to get revenge on Andy.
episodes.title: Red in Tooth and Claw

episodes.synopsis: Nancy starts anew with a job search; Jill drops a bomb on Andy and Doug; and Shane uses his smarts to make extra cash at the police academy.
episodes.title: Allosauraus Crush Castle

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Silas start jobs as pharmaceutical reps; Shane lands a job after graduating from the police academy; and Andy seeks work at the temple.
episodes.title: Unfreeze

episodes.synopsis: Nancy gets promoted and takes on new responsibilities while Silas and Shane start new jobs. Jill breaks some upsetting news to Andy.
episodes.title: Five Miles from Yetzer Hara

episodes.synopsis: Nancy and Silas are approached with a new job opportunity, and Shane does something reckless to impress Angela. Andy offers love advice to Rabbi Dave.
episodes.title: Saplings

episodes.synopsis: Nancy meets Rabbi Dave's friends during an awkward Shabbos dinner, and Andy brings home a special guest to meet the family.
episodes.title: Threshold

episodes.synopsis: Nancy, Andy and Silas take a trip, and Shane get busted for stealing property off the impound lot. Meanwhile, Doug gives up on his charity.
episodes.title: God Willing and the Creek Don't Rise

episodes.synopsis: A flash forward seven years into the future reveals prosperous times for some of the Botwins ... and not-so-prosperous times for others.
episodes.title: It's Time

episodes.synopsis: With little Stevie's bar mitzvah on the horizon, the Botwins attempt to clear the air and Doug reaches out to his estranged gay son.
episodes.title: It's Time: Part 2
